name: In re Kelsey Lauren MILLER, a Minor Under the Age of Fourteen Years. Petition of Kristi L. George

parties: In re Kelsey Lauren MILLER, a Minor Under the Age of Fourteen Years. Petition of Kristi L. George.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of April, 2010, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED with respect to the following issue:
Does the parent of a minor child under the age of fourteen have standing to challenge the appointment of a guardian of that child’s estate made pursuant to a petition filed under Pennsylvania Orphans’ Court Rule 12.5? See Senseman’s Appeal, 21 Pa. 331, 333 (1853).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
992 A.2d 111
In re Kelsey Lauren MILLER, a Minor Under the Age of Fourteen Years. Petition of Kristi L. George.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 7, 2010.
